column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jinya is a chain from California
column2: and I held out for the longest time on the Clear Lake location. There's only one reason I would drive an hour to CL
column3: and it's not ramen (shout out to my best friend Lice. I know you'll read this review and vote Useful
column5: and Cool because that's what BFFs do- support each other on social media).
